Title: Weird Science
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Chris Bishop, Lauren Bans (executive story editor), Matt Mira (executive story editor), Erik Weiner (executive story editor), Aaron Kaczander (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Erica is off to college while Barry is in search of a new girlfriend.
